articles.author: Shahar Ziv
articles.title: Social Security Benefits Could Be Denied Or Delayed For Millions Of New Retirees - Forbes
articles.description: The Social Security Administration confirmed an identity proofing, anit-fraud plan that could delay or even deny Social Security benefits for millions of Americans.
articles.content:
A leaked Social Security Administration memo has unveiled a Trump administration plan that could ... [+] upend the Social Security benefits system for millions of Americans
Getty Images
